Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

plugin add

Apache Cordova Projects

Usage Synopsis
List Apache Cordova plugins $ appbuilder plugin add --available [--debug] [--release]
Add Apache Cordova plugins $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> [--debug] [--release]
Add a specific version of an Apache Cordova plugin $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID>@<Version> [--debug] [--release] [--var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>]**
Add the latest version of an Apache Cordova plugin $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --latest [--debug] [--release] [--var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>]**
Add the default version of an Apache Cordova plugin $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --default [--debug] [--release] [--var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>]**
Add an Apache Cordova plugin and set all variables from the command line $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --var.debug.<Variable ID> <Variable Value> --var.release.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>**
Add a specific version of an Apache Cordova plugin and set all variables from the command line $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID>@<Version> --var.debug.<Variable ID> <Variable Value> --var.release.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>**
Add the latest version of an Apache Cordova plugin and set all variables from the command line $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --latest --var.debug.<Variable ID> <Variable Value> --var.release.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>**
Add the default version of an Apache Cordova plugin and set all variables from the command line $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --default --var.debug.<Variable ID> <Variable Value> --var.release.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>**

** If the Apache Cordova plugin has multiple variables, you can set --var for each variable.

NativeScript Projects

Usage Synopsis
List custom npm or NativeScript modules $ appbuilder plugin add --available [--count]
Add custom npm or NativeScript modules $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> [--no-types]
Add a specific version of a custom npm or NativeScript module $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID>@<Version> [--no-types]
Add the latest version of a verified NativeScript plugin $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --latest [--var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>] [--no-types]**
Add the default version of a verified NativeScript plugin $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID> --default [--var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value>] [--no-types]**
Add a custom npm or NativeScript module from GitHub URL $ appbuilder plugin add <URL> [--no-types]
Add a custom npm or NativeScript module from local path $ appbuilder plugin add <Path> [--no-types]
Add custom npm or NativeScript module and set all variables from the command line $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID or URL or Path> --var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value> [--no-types]**
Add a specific version of a custom npm or NativeScript module and set all variables from the command line $ appbuilder plugin add <Name or ID>@<Version> --var.<Variable ID> <Variable Value> [--no-types]**

** If the NativeScript plugin has multiple variables, you can set --var for each variable.

For TypeScript projects, the command will try to install .d.ts files for the specified module from @types. If you do not want to install the .d.ts files, you can set the --no-types flag.

Enables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project. If the plugin has plugin variables and you have not set one or more of them with --var, the AppBuilder CLI shows an interactive prompt to let you set their values.

Options

  • --available - Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that you can enable in your project and shows information about their variables, if any.
  • --var.<Variable ID> - Sets the value for the specified plugin variable in all configurations.
    (Apache Cordova-only) If --debug or --release is specified, sets the variable for the respective configuration of the hybrid project.
  • --latest - Enables the latest version of the specified verified plugin.
  • --default - Enables the default version of the specified verified plugin.
  • --debug - Enables the specified Apache Cordova plugin for the Debug build configuration only. If --available is set, lists all plugins that you can enable for the Debug build configuration. This option is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • --release - Enables the specified Apache Cordova plugin for the Release build configuration only. If --available is set, lists all plugins that you can enable for the Release build configuration. This option is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • --var.debug.<Variable ID> - Sets the value for the specified Apache Cordova plugin variable for the Debug configuration only. This option is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • --var.release.<Variable ID> - Sets the value for the specified Apache Cordova plugin variable for the Release configuration only. This option is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • --count - If --available is set, specifies the number of npm and NativeScript modules that will be listed. This option is applicable only to NativeScript projects.
  • --no-types - Disables the installation of .d.ts from @types for the specified module. This option is applicable only to NativeScript projects.

Attributes

  • <Name or ID> is the name or ID of the Apache Cordova plugin or custom npm or NativeScript module as listed by $ appbuilder plugin add --available or $ appbuilder plugin find
  • <Version> is the version of the Apache Cordova plugin or custom npm or NativeScript module as listed by $ appbuilder plugin add --available or the npm module specification.
  • <Variable ID> is the plugin variable as listed in the plugin.xml of the Apache Cordova plugin. This parameter is applicable only to Apache Cordova projects.
  • <URL> is the GitHub URL to the custom module. This parameter is applicable only to NativeScript projects.
  • <Path> is the path to local directory or a tarball archive (.tar.gz) that contains a valid custom module. This parameter is applicable only to NativeScript projects.

Related Commands

Command Description
kendoui Lists the available Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional packages that you can add to your project.
kendoui install Updates or adds Kendo UI Code or Kendo UI Professional to your project.
kendoui notes Shows release notes for the available Kendo UI Core and Kendo UI Professional packages.
plugin Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled for your project.
plugin configure Configures plugin variables for selected core, integrated or verified Apache Cordova plugins.
plugin remove Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules from your project.
plugin find Searches by one or more keywords for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
plugin fetch Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules into your project.
